column1: * 1910 - The The Diaries of J.R.R. Tolkien is written by J.R.R. Tolkien.
* 1919 - J.R.R. Tolkien starts a new The Diaries of J.R.R. Tolkien
* 1926 – E.V. Gordon replaces J.R.R. Tolkien in the Chair of English Language at the University of Leeds.
* 1938 – In a series of lectures aimed at children
column2: J.R.R. Tolkien Lecture on Dragons in the University of Oxford Museum.

column1: * 1941 – J.R.R. Tolkien resigns as Governor of King Edwards School.
* 1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mr Polet.
* 1972 - Voice actress Jennifer Hale is born.
* 1995 - Proceedings of the J.R.R. Tolkien Centenary Conference is published.
* 2008 - Fantasy novel The Search for the Red Dragon is published.
* 2018 - A Well of Wonder: C. S. Lewis
column3: and The Inklings will be published.
